channel.title: 14.0.0.2.6 no internet connection
channel.description:
Hey, I have installed 14.0.0.2.6 Whonix and gateway have no connection,when run WhonixCheck have this error:
(Debugging information: Neigher file /var/cache/whonix-setup-wizard/status-files/whonixsetup.done nor file /var/cache/whonix-setup-wizard/status-files/whonixsetup.skip exists.)
How this could be fixed?

item.title: 14.0.0.2.6 no internet connection
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
VIN:

Network is fine,internal-external,checked with 13 version,maybe just copy these files from 13 to 14?

Btw that certainly is wrong. These are status files. Just empty files.
If they do not exist, implies that state was not reached yet. By faking
that state you only end up with another whonixcheck error because Tor
would still not be enabled. whonixcheck is a check. It does not change
system settings, fix networking etc.

Read full topic

item.title: 14.0.0.2.6 no internet connection
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
bmtkn1:

I need dev version

Then you need to read the related forum thread for that developers version. It explains how to start whonixsetup manually.
https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-14-0-0-2-6-developers-only

Read full topic

item.title: 14.0.0.2.6 no internet connection
item.dc:creator: bmtkn1
item.description:
I need dev version because i want to build from source,like post in this thread

Build error "prepare-build-machine" Development
Hello Whonix Team !! When Im building latest Whonix from source have this main error 1100_prepare-build-machine detected! git checkout 14.0.0.3.2-developers-only sudo ~/Whonix/whonix_build --build --target qcow2 --flavor whonix-gateway -- --build --arch amd64 --kernel linux-image-amd64 --headers linux-headers-amd64 --vmsize 2G I know its related to Whonix already installed system name,but have this error all the time,even on clean reinstalled Debian system. Any help would be appreciate…

Dont you know whats the problem is there?
Network is fine,internal-external,checked with 13 version,maybe just copy these files from 13 to 14?

Read full topic

item.title: 14.0.0.2.6 no internet connection
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Don’t use the developers-only version.

Download from https://www.whonix.org/download.

Not download.whonix.org.

Read full topic
